title: Chicken Marsala
tagline: Pan-seared chicken in mushroom wine sauce
steps: Pound chicken to ½-inch. Season, dredge in flour.
Cook chicken in 2 tbsp butter and oil until golden, 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer out.
Add remaining butter and mushrooms. Brown 5 minutes. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds.
Add Marsala, scrape up browned bits. Reduce by half.
Add broth, simmer 5 minutes. Stir in cream.
Return chicken, simmer until cooked through, 3-5 minutes. Add parsley.
notes: Use dry Marsala, not sweet cooking Marsala.
